TopicTitle: BobCat Ind. - Colonization, exploring and research vehicle

Articles.Content: the spaceport server isn't damaged from the idle connection attack, right?
No. Everything is still there
Has anyone seen a cassowary? It is an awesome bird look it up if you have not seen it, looks almost like a dinosaur! Can't wait to fly the shuttle though!
Cassowarys are big and flightless, just like the initial development of the mod! Hehehehehe

I know in fact they are a precious species because they show us the link between raptor like dinosaurs and birds. Also the thought that this mod is coming soon is making me jump for joy, in fact I think i might just explode with excitement! You guys are the best!

I really look forward to the HOME mk2. Can we get some pictures of those?

There is currently a media blackout at our Siberian testing facility due to an unfortunate re-entry test involving a HOME2 command pod prototype and a Toblerone-fueled, bat**** insane designer...

We'll get back to you after I've finished scrubbing toilets and serving everyone's meals......

Can we use our behavior and proper sentence structure please? Otherwise, others cannot decipher your rather archaic message. Are you trying to be insulting or are you trying to say that you were looking at the other "chopper" and forgot that bobcat and crew released the EX in it's stead?

bobcat could we please get some pictures of the cassowary. Can't wait for the release which, and I am just asking to confirm also that the cassowary will be released in home 2m.

It breaks PhysX, so it isn't an awesome vehicle, at best it's a lag feast, at worst it can summon the kraken onto the surface of Kerbin, all the way from the moons of Jool instantiously.

Hi could you please explain this. I am planning on creating a large dropship type craft. What cause PhysX to break? What are the rough size limits?

Thanks

Hi could you please explain this. I am planning on creating a large dropship type craft. What cause PhysX to break? What are the rough size limits?

Devo already has a drop ship that's pretty big,so im also curious about that yha,i also have seen bigger 1 piece crafts so idk how it could brake the physx

Heracles was much bigger than anything else that was attempted in the game. Devo's dropship isn't on the same scale. The issues was with nodes and masses (it was explained much better but that post is now gone) and I have talked to c7 on a livestream and he said it wasn't likely to be fixed anytime soon. [/disscussion]

At this point, I lost interest any fly stuff. And concentrated on ground and wheeled stuff.

Anyway , im waiting new patch.

I can't wait for the Mk6 Gen2! It looks amazing in the YouTube video and I'm loving the tweels, much more realistic and better looking than the stock wheels!

Is there a particular feature you're waiting for in the update?

At this point, I lost interest any fly stuff. And concentrated on ground and wheeled stuff.

Anyway , im waiting new patch.

I can understand that you don't want anymore discussion about the Hercules as it (currently) can't be done. It's a pity as the shape is so beautiful. Have you considered designing a troopcarrier with the same shape as the ...... but a lot smaller? (And i don't mean that as "design it now". It's just meant as a possible idea for in the future when you feel like designing flying stuff again.)

Heracles was much bigger than anything else that was attempted in the game. Devo's dropship isn't on the same scale. The issues was with nodes and masses (it was explained much better but that post is now gone) and I have talked to c7 on a livestream and he said it wasn't likely to be fixed anytime soon. [/disscussion]

Thank you for that. I'll keep that in mind when I start coming into to problems with my dropship.
